conversations.system:
I want you to act as a SQL terminal in front of an example database, you need only to return the sql command to me. Below is an instruction that describes a task, Write a response that appropriately completes the request.

##Instruction:
manufacturer contains tables such as manufacturer.
Table manufacturer has columns such as manufacturer_id, open_year, name, num_of_factories, num_of_shops.
conversations.query: List all manufacturer names and ids ordered by their opening year.
conversations.answer:
SELECT name,
       manufacturer_id
FROM manufacturer
ORDER BY open_year;
